string.text: You can't run Render 2 on your PC
Connection error: connection rejected by server
The file with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
Please select at least one map
Do you really want to leave the game?
press ($$ACTION_JUMP$$) to exit to main menu
Connection error: CD-Key already in use.
Connection error: Your CD-Key is disabled. Contact customer's service.

New patch is available.
 Version: %s
 Location: %s
Do you want to download it now?
You really want to delete the file?
Trying to connect to master server
Patch was successfully downloaded. Do you want to install it?
Loading game will cause losing non-saved data. Proceed?
Saved game version mismatch or saved game is corrupted
There are no suitable items to be dismantled for spares.
Pick an item from the list to be used as spares.
That wouldn't work - the item is ruined. Choose one in better condition.
The item could or may not be repaired any more.
The item does not need repairs.
You managed to improve the item's condition.
You didn't manage to improve the item's condition.
Your insufficient skills worsened the item's condition.
The item has been successfully repaired.
You don't have enough money to repair this item.
Select item for repair from list.
You don't have enough money to buy this transport.
Choose the item to be transfered from the list.
You cannot place this item in the trunk - it's already full.
You can't take more than three items as reward.
You exceeded money limit for reward.
Puch "Extended" button to change settings added by OGSE mod
Point mouse cursor to option and you'll see its description. In that way you can understand the meaning of options that are unfamiliar to you and new options.
WARNING! OFFLINE DEATH IS DETECTED! Object: ID:
Loot will be processed and oject will be added to delete sequence!
WARNING! PROCESSED OFFLINE DEAD MONSTER IS DETECTED! Object: ID:
WARNING! Logic initialization is failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Loot generation is failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Hit callback processing failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Shoot sound processing failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Death by APC processing failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Torchlight processing failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Rank massive cleaning failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
WARNING! Damaged quest corpse is found! Object:
Make sure that corpse is ok and it gave you all neccessary infoportions and other stuff!
WARNING! Sound callback processing failed! There's a diagnostic message in log - save game, exit and send log to OGSE team!
is dead, like all others! You've gained bad fame among stalker community!
"Found signal of the PDA of your companion. "
Fire is controlled by gunman (companion is required)
Press 'Advanced' button to change settings, added by OGSE.
Point mouse cursor on setting and you'll see its description. In this way you can understand the meaning of setting.
You can't fill the flask. There's no specific water around.
You can't drink medicine alone. Give it to Chuk!
Marked One, are you nuts? Why the hell did you kill him? Are you consider yourself, like, Terminator? Mission's failed.
Marked One, there's a problem. Target eliminated hunter. Do me a favor, clean that mess up. There will be a reward.
You can't destroy O-21 specimen. There's no anomaly around that capable to destroy its structure.
Marked One, it's Monolith squad commander. We know, you're here - HE told us. Show up yourself and die like a man. You've gone too far! It's your destiny. Don't even try to escape - exit is blocked.
Good password! Now you can disable Brain Scorcher.
Antialiasing quality on static renderer - r__supersample

This option defines the degree of inertion of player's point of view. The bigger the value, the stronger the swing of point of view while walking or running, if hit. Also scope offset will be more noticable if protagonist is exhausted. WARNING! This is controversial option, don't enable it if you don't know exactly what you're doing.

This option controls multiplier for visibility distance from weather profile. Range is from 0.4 to 1.5. For example, if base weather visibility distance is 150 meters, on minimum option visibility will be 60 meters, on maximum - 225 meters. WARNING! Option affects performance since more objects need to be drawn in frame with bigger option values.
This option controls quality of rendering and lighting of models of human, monsters and weapon. The bigger the value, the more smooth and detailed models will be.
This option controls how tight grass bushes are rendered. The bigger the value, the more dense grass. WARNING! Heavily affects performance, change it in small steps.

This option controls maximum distance of grass rendering. The bigger the value, the bigger the grass area. Range of option is from 48 (standard Stalker value) to 240 meters. WARNING! Heavily affects performance, change it in moderate steps. Good looking value is 150-200 meters (middle of trackbar).
This option enables optimized mode of grass rendering. Helps to save some performance if grass distance and density are big enough. Game restart is required.
This option controls texture detalization. The bigger the value, the better quality of textures can be achieved.
This option controls quality of anisotropic filtration for textures. Minimum value is 1x filtration, maximum - 6x. The bigger the value, the better texture look on far distance.
This optiona enables bloodmarks on bodies after firewound.
This option controls quality of antialiasing on static renderer.
This option enables shadows from the sun. Disable it for performance boost on weak PC.

This option enables casting shadows of grass bushes from sun and other light sources.Now we fixed it and it really works. WARNING! Heavily affects performance, especially in combination with big grass distance and density.
This option controls quality of shadows on distance. The bigger the value, the better quality of shadows from dynamic light sources.

This option enables flashlights of NPC as dynamic light sources. They will be processed with accurately lighting and shadowing. Disabling it can boost performance during nights in locations with lot of stalkers.
This option controls shadow rendering. The more the value, the smoother shadow edges.

This option enables vertycal sync, i.e. accordance between FPS and monitor frequency. When enabled eliminates effect of horizontal offset some parts of frame after fast mouse moves, but also can reduce FPS.
This option forces game to run with 60 FPS. Helpful when game can't properly determine monitor frequency.
This option enables shader antialiasing on dynamic renderer.
This option switches type of shader antialiasing on dynamic renderer. There're two types of it - FXAA (Fast Approximate AntiAliasing) and SMAA (Subpixel Morphological AntiAliasing).

This option controls switching between mip levels of textures. Normal trackbar position is middle; when less, textures on far distance will be less sharp, when bigger - more sharp. If too high, can cause flickering on distant objects.

This option controls reflectance of surfaces with materials like metal, leather, wood and other. WARNING! This is controversial setting, don't change it if you're not sure, what you're doing. Big values cause weird look.

This option controls distance of big quality shadows rendering. On distance, bigger than this, simplifier shadow rendering is occured. Can be switched in range from 1 to 60. MUST be configured in couple with shadow map resolution. The bigger the value, the bigger shadow map resolution should be used for good quality.
This option controls angle of view in which shadows are rendered properly. Cause strange triangle shadows when value of this angle isn't enough. It's recommended to max this option.
This option enables shadow rendering from real sun position. WARNING! Shadows will be true, but FPS can be greatly reduced when sun rises or sets.
This option enables High Dynamic Range effect. It can enhance image by mapping frame, rendered in full range into monitor color range.
This option controls HDR effect intensity. WARNING! Adjust it very careful or your image will be overbright and unrealistic.
This option controls intensity of sunlight. The bigger the value, the brighter sunlight and the deeper the shadows.

This option controls ambient light intensity. The bigger the value, the brighter all shadowed spots in game. WARNING! This is controversial setting, change it only if you're sure what you're doing. Raise it if you think that game is really dark, but very high values can flatten the image.
This option controls rendering of volumetric lights.
This option switches the type of volumetric lighting. You can choose between Crysis of Stalker:CLear Sky types. WARNING! Clear sky lights heavily affects performance.
This option enables soft water edges. With this option enabled edges of water will smoothly fades out whith decreasing deepness. WARNING! Game restart is required.
This option enables soft particles. Greatly enhances look of fire, smoke particles and so on. WARNING! Game restart is required.
This option controls smoothness of game shadows, leads to more realistic shadows.
This option controls smoothness of shadows of lamps. More realistic shadows can be achieved.

This option enables precalculated global illumination. It uses hemi-lightmaps, prepared during locations compilation. Don't affect performance. Option will cause more darker indoor, so tune it wisely. Remember that SSAO also leads to darker image. If used in combination it's better to decrease strength of both effects.
This option controls intensity of precalculated global illumination. The bigger the value, the more realistic image, but high values causes dark indoors.
This option enables shader ambient occlusion effect. If enabled, gives more realistic image due to calculation of self-shadowing. Affects performance.
This option controls mode of shader ambient occlusion effect.
This option controls steep parallax effect. It uses raytracing in heightmap space which can give more realistic surface. WARNING! Game restart is required.
This option enables depth of field (DOF) effect. If you don't like it, disable it.
This option enables additional DOF effect while reloading.
This option enables additional DOF effect while aiming.
This option controls DOF effect quality.
This option enables detail bump, which adds little details and roughness on objects. WARNING! Game restart is required.
This options enables flares on lamps.
This option enables imitation of lens "dirt" on screen.
This option enables drops on helmet and antigas lenses during rain.
This option enables dynamic puddles, that appears during rain.
This option enables wet surfaces during rain. Õ‡ÒÚ¸HÅE ‚ÍÅE˜‡ÂÚ ˙¸ÅEÅE˚GÅEÅE‚Âı˚MÒÚÂÈ ‚Ó ‚ÂÏˇ ‰ÓÊ‰ˇ. WARNING! Game restart is required.
This options enables volumetric light from some lamps.
This option enables reflections on water, puddles and wet surfaces (if they're enabled) during rain. WARNING! Game restart is required. Also, HEAVILY affects performance.
This option controls reflections mode. There're next modes: on water only, on asphalt only and on both. WARNING! Can affect performance if choosed asphalt or both.
This option enables shaders optimization mode. Can increase FPS on videoadapters with poor memory bandwidth or memory bus capacity. WARNING! Game restart is required.
This option controls sharpness of image. WARNING! This is controversial setting. Enable it only if you like granular image.
This option enables volumetric fog in game. It's used for imitation of fog in ravines, turbid water and so on.
from Dark Valley to Military Warehouses
from Military Warehouses to Dark Valley
